unnormalised: Infosys announces that employee ID no. INF12345 now has access to the new AI training module. All employees with emp IDs starting with INF are required to complete the training by 31/12/2024.
normalised: Infosys announces that employee I-D no. I-N-F one two three four five now has access to the new A-I training module. All employees with emp I-Ds starting with I-N-F are required to complete the training by thirty first december two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: The company spokesperson, Ms. Priya Sharma, said that over 50,000 employees will be affected by this mandatory training. She added that the unique employee identification number helps track progress and ensures compliance. Folks with employee codes in the old format (pre-2015), example, E123456, will be transitioned to the new INF format by HR.
normalised: The company spokesperson, Ms. Priya Sharma, said that over fifty thousand employees will be affected by this mandatory training. She added that the unique employee identification number helps track progress and ensures compliance. Folks with employee codes in the old format, pre two thousand and fifteen, example, E one two three four five six, will be transitioned to the new I-N-F format by H-R.

unnormalised: Failure to complete the training may impact performance reviews, said a senior manager anonymously. Current Infosys employees are advised to check their updated ID cards or online employee portal for the correct employee number. New hires after 01/01/2025 need not worry.
normalised: Failure to complete the training may impact performance reviews, said a senior manager anonymously. Current Infosys employees are advised to check their updated I-D cards or online employee portal for the correct employee number. New hires after first january two thousand and twenty five need not worry.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Wipro announced a similar initiative. Their employee codes, WPR12345, will also be used for internal skill assessments. It appears companies want to keep track of everyone's progress.
normalised: Meanwhile, Wipro announced a similar initiative. Their employee codes, W-P-R one two three four five, will also be used for internal skill assessments. It appears companies want to keep track of everyone's progress.

unnormalised: It will be interesting to see how the rollout goes, especially getting everyone to remember their employee numbers! It feels like we're all being assigned serial numbers lol.
normalised: It will be interesting to see how the rollout goes, especially getting everyone to remember their employee numbers! It feels like we are all being assigned serial numbers laugh out loud.
